list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(models): add user and cost schemas
Added schemas for users and costs: - Users schema includes id, first_name, last_name, birthday, marital_status with enum validation. - Costs schema includes description, category, userid, sum, and date with default value.
feat(config): implement database connection
Added `connectDB` function to manage MongoDB connection: - Uses environment variable `MONGO_URI`. - Handles connection errors and logs successful connections.
docs(env): update `.env` file example
Added `MONGO_URI` and `PORT` example configuration for developers to follow.
